Name: Reduce Industry Emissions
Description: Place a tax on industries who do not lower their emmisions to an acceptable level.

Name: Litter Collection Scheme
Description: Award citizens for their efforts to keep $city's streets clean of litter.

Name: Technology Investment
Description: Invest more of the city's money into researching new technologies.

Name: Mandatory Conscription
Description: Force the residents of $city into a mandatory military program to train them in combat.

Name: Open Borders
Description: Remove any restrictions on travel into or out of $city.

Name: Closed Borders
Description: Have entry into $city limited only to those with the correct documentation.

Name: Refugee Acceptance
Description: Accept the victims of conflict or loss from other cities into your own.

Name: Trade Agreement
Description: Launch a scheme to increase the opportunities for trade with neighbouring cities.

Name: City Parade
Description: Organise a series of themed parades for citizens of $city to enjoy.

Name: Deforestation Program
Description: Begin clearing forests near the city to produce materials for industry.
